page.title: 02Doxford Park shopping centre
page.content: This{shopping centre}was built for people round the area to shop in and for people to travel to for all their shopping. The shops that are there are Presto's, a video centre, Apbond, Unit 7, chemist, building society, grocer's and a bakery shop. There is also a pub called the {Doxford Lad}and a post office where they sell newspapers, toys, books, comics, drinks, stationery, cigarettes and sweets. There is also a betting shop. In Presto's they sell food, cups, sweets and toys. In the video shop they sell and hire videos. In the Precinct there is also a D.I.Y. shop which sells pet food, pet cages and things like door handles. Next is Apbond which sells toys, jewellery, cards and ornaments, and also home appliances. The building society keeps our money safe.
